about_the_game:
Voidborn is a fast-paced roguelite FPS that combines fine tuned movement- and combat inspired by Ultrakill and Doom Eternal with level- and character progression inspired by Hades.

EXPLORE A DARK FANTASY WORLD

Set in a in a dark fantasy world inspired by Dark Souls, you play as a Voidborn. A powerful creature created by the gods destined to reclaim The Kingdom of Twilight and bring radiance back to the lands. Explore a dark decaying world with various unique environments that change from each survival attempt.

WIELD POWERFUL WEAPONS

Customize your weapons with a wide variety of upgrades. Shoot lightning beams that scatter between enemies, shoot icicles that stun, bullets that ricochet, or upgrade your weapons with different explosives. Use your gravity powers to deflect incoming projectiles, boost yourself high in the air or push enemies off ledges.

BECOME UNSTOPPABLE

Unlock new weapons and abilities and permanently upgrade your character and your weapons in the hub area to survive longer on your next run.

short_description: Voidborn is a fast-paced roguelite FPS that combines skill-based action and swift movement with roguelike level progression and character customization. Rip apart demons with devastating weapon builds and reach as far as possible before you inevitably perish and become reborn stronger than ever.
